content: Well, it appears that I dumped everything for the last four months into the feed, except for Twitter entries. :-) Everything looked fine here because I didn't scroll down in the page and see that there were a zillion extra entries. If you read the feed directly, it should already be fixed and you might have no idea what this is about. If you use Google Reader, there's now a bunch of old entries in it.
title: Sorry again!
